extension.summary: Watch NHK World Live TV and News
extension.description: Stream NHK World live (1080p), browse programs and categories, and watch the latest NHK news by region. Includes multilingual interface support.
extension.news: v1.0.0 — Initial release (Live TV, Programs, News, Search, Multilingual) v1.0.1 — Lastest Shows, Trending added v1.1.0 — Search both Shows and News. Live & Catch Up added v1.1.1 — Remove Live Now Live & Catch Ups will go straight to today's schedule and focus on the live stream, ViewList (50) is required by default (can be changed in settings) Improved the display between Tokyo time and local time. The schedule is based entirely in Tokyo time but will display the local date and time by default (change to Tokyo time in settings)
